[00:16.14]Christmas
[00:17.47]The snow's coming down

[00:21.27]I'm watching it fall
[00:23.78]Christmas

[00:27.43]Christmas

[00:31.21]Christmas

[00:34.91]Christmas

[00:38.79]Christmas

[00:42.62]Christmas

[00:46.78]They're singing Deck the Halls
[00:50.54]But it's not like Christmas at all
[00:54.37]'Cause I remember when you were here
[00:58.23]And all the fun we had last year

[00:27.43]圣诞节

[00:54.37]因为我想起你还在这里的时候
